Primary Contact: Amanda Barrett, Manager of Residential Services; Phone: 778.436.9476; Email: amanda.barrett@jhscso.bc.ca
Service Details: - Offers a ten-bed, shared accommodation, third stage recovery home for adult men (19+) recovering from substance misuse and substance misuse related issues- Provides a safe, nurturing and supportive environment where men recovering from substance misuse and related issues can engage in programs and activities that promote healthy living and facilitate their transition to the next stage of recovery
How to Apply: Please download the Supportive Housing Registration (SHR) Service form from our website and fax completed form to BC Housing’s Penticton office at 250.492.1080. You can also scan/email the application to their Health and Housing Coordinator, Ana Frias at interiorregion@bchousing.org.
Address & Map: 1043 Harvey AveKelowna, BC     V1Y 6E4View MapQuest Map
